{{Enemy Intro}}

Two [[Local Legend]] Hat Jellyfish, '''Chassanion''' and '''Mageblade Corrouge''', can be found underneath the [[Sealed Ruined Tower]] and [[Roots of Erinnyes]] respectively. After completing the {{Quest|In the Wake of Narcissus}}, Chassanion can be found inside the [[Tower of Ipsissimus]]. Mageblade Corrogue can only be fought after the {{Quest|The Wild Fairy of Erinnyes}} is completed.

===Local Legend===
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy = Hat Jellyfish Local Legend

|name_1      = Bubble Shot
|desc_1      = Fires a slow-moving bubble that travels towards the player. It will explode upon coming in contact with the player or after traveling for a period of time, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}}. By continuously hitting the bubble with the [[Xenochromatic Ball Octopus]]' ability, the bubble will be launched back towards the jellyfish, causing it to lose '''~17.6%''' of its Max HP.

|name_2      = Bubble Mayhem
|desc_2      = Creates many bubbles around itself and starts charging. They will explode upon coming in contact with the player or after the jellyfish finishes charging, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}}. By continuously hitting the bubble with the Xenochromatic Ball Octopus' ability, the bubble will be launched back towards the jellyfish, causing it to lose '''~17.6%''' of its Max HP.
|caption_2   = Charging
|file_2_2    = Hat Jellyfish Local Legend Bubble Mayhem 2
